'''Kaveh''' is an upcoming playable [[Dendro]] [[character]] in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

The architect behind his magnum opus the [[Palace of Alcazarzaray]], Kaveh was a student of the [[Kshahrewar]] Darshan of the [[Sumeru Akademiya]] and graduated with honors.<ref>{{Ref/NPC|Araby}}</ref> Having accrued a lot of debt after the construction of the Palace of Alcazarzaray, he was forced to reside with [[Alhaitham]], whom he constantly bickers with.
